marklogic.body:
Lee did not make a mistake. What he did was clearly a willful criminal Act of hate. What the hell was Lee thinking? Did he intend for a mob to go over to the house and drag the people in it out into the street? Did he intend for a mob to go over and Burn down the house? What he did is to incite a mob to violent action and should be held accountable by law enforcement.
If someone now tweeted Lee's address would he feel a same terror that that poor couple felt? Ignorant jerks like Lee should let law enforcement handle situations like this.
